### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install autoconf arch=linux-rhel7-power8le
==> Warning: Using GCC 4.8 to optimize for Power 8 might not work if you are not on Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7, where a custom backport of the feature has been done. Upstream support from GCC starts in version 4.9

[+] /home/user/spack-0.16.2/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-power8le/gcc-4.8.5/berkeley-db-18.1.40-t3x7wr3zfa6qkvf64wvvgubnltu2tvyl
[+] /home/user/spack-0.16.2/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-power8le/gcc-4.8.5/pkgconf-1.7.3-vzmd2eiszaid2mz7cdyufa6a5wtgstmp
[+] /home/user/spack-0.16.2/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-power8le/gcc-4.8.5/m4-1.4.18-ujfdwtaemutf3es2doezt4x6rfxiaanm
[+] /home/user/spack-0.16.2/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-power8le/gcc-4.8.5/ncurses-6.2-uszrlwxzdwe3nyj2hwhb3jkhtc5lgpkv
[+] /home/user/spack-0.16.2/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-power8le/gcc-4.8.5/readline-8.0-djztk7gruh65ryoa4zrvpyiz5rnnmrhz
[+] /home/user/spack-0.16.2/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-power8le/gcc-4.8.5/gdbm-1.18.1-2qarpshhhmcc3fozbljikl26t6f5gpls
[+] /home/user/spack-0.16.2/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-power8le/gcc-4.8.5/perl-5.32.0-yegtja5ecg5bb36mieemj3q2imtd527l
==> Installing autoconf-2.69-nhgcmyb562pjbsaiie2fokkdielckwwm
==> No binary for autoconf-2.69-nhgcmyb562pjbsaiie2fokkdielckwwm found: installing from source
==> Using cached archive: /home/user/spack-0.16.2/var/spack/cache/_source-cache/archive/95/954bd69b391edc12d6a4a51a2dd1476543da5c6bbf05a95b59dc0dd6fd4c2969.tar.gz
==> autoconf: Executing phase: 'autoreconf'
==> [2021-06-10-12:20:41.891010] CalledProcessError: Command '['/tmp/netuser/spack-stage/spack-stage-autoconf-2.69-nhgcmyb562pjbsaiie2fokkdielckwwm/spack-src/build-aux/config.guess']' returned non-zero exit status 1.
==> Error: RuntimeError: Failed to find suitable substitutes for config.guess

/home/user/spack-0.16.2/lib/spack/spack/build_systems/autotools.py:170, in _do_patch_config_files:
        167
        168        # Check that we found everything we needed
        169        if to_be_found:
  >>    170            msg = 'Failed to find suitable substitutes for {0}'
        171            raise RuntimeError(msg.format(', '.join(to_be_found)))
        172
        173        # Copy the good files over the bad ones
```

### Information on your system

```
spack debug report
* **Spack:** 0.16.2
* **Python:** 3.6.8
* **Platform:** linux-rhel7-power8le
```

### Additional information

This is the same error as in https://github.com/spack/spack/pull/21256, but here the file config.guess (and config.sub) is executable:
```
$ tar -tvf autoconf-2.69.tar.gz |grep config
-rwxrwxr-x 0/0           35516 2012-04-24 19:37 autoconf-2.69/build-aux/config.sub
-rwxrwxr-x 0/0           44826 2012-04-24 19:15 autoconf-2.69/build-aux/config.guess
```

Same error is reported for autoconf 2.62 and 2.59.
Autoconf 2.13 instead is so old that one of the patches fails with:
```
==> Error: FileNotFoundError: [Errno 2] No such file or directory: 'bin/autom4te.in'

/home/user/spack-0.16.2/var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/autoconf/package.py:43, in patch:
         40        # because autom4te is called during the build
         41        filter_file('^#! @PERL@ -w',
         42                    '#! /usr/bin/env perl',
  >>     43                    'bin/autom4te.in')
```

* `spack-build-out.txt` only contains a `CalledProcessError: Command '['/tmp/netuser/spack-stage/spack-stage-autoconf-2.69-nhgcmyb562pjbsaiie2fokkdielckwwm/spack-src/build-aux/config.guess']' returned non-zero exit status 1.`
* [spack-build-env.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/6633907/spack-build-env.txt)

### General information

- [x] I have run `spack debug report` and reported the version of Spack/Python/Platform
- [x] I have run `spack maintainers <name-of-the-package>` and @mentioned any maintainers
- [x] I have uploaded the build log and environment files
- [x] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
title: Installation issue: autoconf on ppc64le
